abstract: Billboard is reporting that Apple has started to push back against music labels that have worked out exclusive deals with Amazon in exchange for being featured on the online retailer’s MP3 Daily Deal.
snippet: Billboard is reporting that Apple has started to push back against music labels that have worked out exclusive deals with Amazon in exchange for being featured on the online retailer’s MP3 Daily Deal.
lead_paragraph: Amazon and Apple aren’t just jostling for e-book readers.

headline.main: A New Round in Apple and Amazon Music Fight
